message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90. It's a steal at this price, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $70. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $82. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product at this price!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $82. I'd be willing to meet you at $78. Can you consider that?

I understand that you're still a bit above $82, Bob, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $84. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product at this price!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $84. I'd be willing to meet you at $80. Can you consider that?
